title: 160: Modern Maths
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: "A Mathematician's Lament," by Paul Lockhart, mourns the way we teach math to children. In many ways, he's right. A.J. will probably still find something to complain about, though.
itunes:author: So, Cah, Toah
itunes:subtitle: Making our kids math proof. See what I did there?
